title: Unique work situations – International Mobility Program and Temporary Foreign Worker Program
manual: Unique work situations – International Mobility Program and Temporary Foreign Worker Program
heading_path: Unique work situations – International Mobility Program and Temporary Foreign Worker Program
text:
Published Time: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 00:44:02 GMT

Unique work situations – International Mobility Program and Temporary Foreign Worker Program
============================================================================================

This section contains policy, procedures and guidance used by IRCC staff. It is posted on the department’s website as a courtesy to stakeholders.

To determine whether a temporary resident requires a work permit or a Labour Market Impact Assessment(LMIA), the officer should first determine whether the activity the person seeks to engage in constitutes “work” as defined by the _Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations_. For a better understanding of the term “work”, refer to _[What is work](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/what-is-work.html)_.

Unique work situations
----------------------

* [Airline personnel](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/airline-personnel.html)
* [Bridge and tunnel authorities](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/compliance-exempt-employers/bridge.html)
* [Residential summer camp counsellors](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/camp-counsellors-r205-b-exemption-code-c20.html)
* [Foreign camp owner or director](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/foreign-camp-owner-director-outfitters.html)
* [Fishing guides](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/fishing-guides.html)
* [Interns](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/interns.html)
* [Interns with international organizations recognized under the _Foreign Missions and International Organizations Act_](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/interns-international-organizations-recognized-under-foreign-missions-international-organizations-act.html)
* [_Oceans Act_](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/oceans-act.html)
* [United States government personnel](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/united-states-government-personnel.html)
* [Rail grinder operators, rail welders or other specialized track maintenance workers](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/rail-grinder-operators-rail-welders-other-specialized-track-maintenance-workers.html)
* [Foreign freelance jockeys](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/foreign-freelance-race-jockeys-working-western-provinces-only.html)
* [Experts on mission, working for a United Nations office in Canada (LMIA exemption code C10)](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/experts-mission.html)
* [Caribbean Agricultural Liaison Officers [R205(a) – C10] – Canadian interests – International Mobility Program](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/caribbean-liaison-officers.html)
* [World Anti-Doping Agency international employees [R205(a) – C10] – Unique situations: International Mobility Program](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/corporate/publications-manuals/operational-bulletins-manuals/temporary-residents/foreign-workers/unique-situations/wada-international-employees.html)

Page details
------------

 2023-07-28
